title: The One Where Lala Learns About Furries In School
description:
Lala is fresh out of Salt Lake City and feeling the love for her hometown! She has plenty of thoughts to share about aliens, Hulu’s “Under The Banner Of Heaven,” and Santa & his elves. She and Jessica also discuss furries in school, and an unbelievably triggering post on the Utah Parents United Instagram account. This one’s a little heavy and serious, might not be best for the kiddos to hear, but Lala really wants you to weigh in, so let your voices be heard at 424-255-9131.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: Lala Kent | Cumulus Podcast Network
